column1: I’m proud to follow a courageous and decisive leader. Even in the face of blind criticism he does what needs to be done to keep Americans safe. Thank you @realDonaldTrump!!

The far Left’s disrespect and contempt for our president is embarrassing. I support the decisiveness of @realDonaldTrump and the leadership he continues to show — RT if you do too! https://t.co/Vox7K5KdRJ

First it was NO obstruction NO collusion. Then it was NO quid pro quo. Now it’s NO bribery.  This impeachment is a joke. Support our President & tell the Left to take a hike. We’re on our way to a 2020 win! https://t.co/imKSDvKsmB

“It’s time for the House speaker to get on with it.”  I couldn’t agree more. As @SpeakerPelosi loses the backing of her supporters the #impeachmentscam continues to drag on and waste everyone’s time. https://t.co/CN3wrVizXs
First it was NO obstruction NO collusion. Then it was NO quid pro quo.  Now it’s NO bribery.

It seems like no one knows what @SpeakerPelosi was doing holding onto the impeachment articles  —  not even her own party. Further evidence that this #impeachmentscam is complete nonsense. https://t.co/sUfMjO74FU

For the first time in our nation’s history approval of articles of impeachment was one-sided. Pelosi knows the articles don’t stand a chance in the Senate so she’s dragging out this political charade by refusing to send the articles.

Nancy Pelosi & other Dem "leaders" have intentionally dragged America through a #shamimpeachment. They abused the impeachment process for political gain and wasted taxpayer dollars to do it. I stand with 63 million Americans and President Trump. Join me: https://t.co/imKSDvKsmB

Instead of sending the articles of impeachment to the Senate Pelosi is holding them hostage until she hears how the Senate will conduct its trial.  Newsflash Pelosi - You’re not a senator. You don’t get to make the rules.

Rather than legislating House Dems are ringing in the new year with continued impeachment nonsense. Pelosi had to have known how wrong impeachment was but she pressed on and now the far Left’s dreams of impeachment will die in the Senate - should the articles ever get there.

The far Left is cracked. I guess the strong economy the lowest unemployment rates in decades wage increases and countless job opportunities mean nothing to them.  Everyone is making gains in the Trump economy. I see it all the time around rural America. https://t.co/JOvvw6uvWF

Support for impeachment dropped 5% last month. Pelosi refuses to send the articles to the Senate.   The far Left refuses to listen to the American people. We voted for President Trump once we’re happy with the job he’s done & we’ll vote for him again! https://t.co/ymrU95T0gV

What we saw today was a gross abuse of power by those in the Democrat majority. Basic tenants of our Constitution were once again manipulated to serve their political end. What a sad sad day.  I will continue to stand with support and defend our president @realDonaldTrump!

Newsflash: President Trump is the duly elected President of the United States. You can’t impeach him because you don’t like him.
We saw a pivot in the middle of Mueller Investigation and we’re seeing same in this Impeachment Sham. What started off as a fabrication of “quid pro quo” has become a tall tale of “bribery.”
Trump: I didn’t pressure Zelensky. Zelensky: Trump didn’t pressure me. Schiff: IMPEACH.  Where’s the logic here? Oh wait. It wasn’t here from the start and it’s certainly not here now.
It’s just that simple - neither witness believes an impeachable offense occurred on the July 25 phone call. They had their chance to say it and neither said a thing.

Neither Kent nor Taylor was on the call. We have the transcript. There should be no doubt where the truth of the matter sits: President Trump did nothing wrong. This impeachment foundation and process is a sham.

The Democrats will stop at nothing in their outrageous quest for impeachment. Ever since the 2016 election they’ve sought to undermine the legitimacy of Donald Trump’s presidency. It’s as simple as this: They lost — and they can’t stand it.
